1.definition: an agreement to submit a dispute to and abide by the decision of an arbitrator [an award falls within the general rule that acts of arbitrators must…be coextensive with the ", 218 P.2d 736 (1950)"]

2.definition: an act of submitting something [upon of a properly completed memorandum "J. H. Friedenthal"]something submitted

3.definition: an act of submitting to the authority or control of another
